EmailTemplate.subject: Solar at {!Account.Name} - 5 year payback and 20% IRR
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I am writing to see if {!Account.Name} has considered solar. I know many of your peers in California have considered it in the past, but costs have dropped by almost 25% over the last year, and we're seeing that projects that didn't pencil as recently as 2011 are penciling now. Furthermore, California's rebate program is drying up, so this is a perfect time to run some numbers to see if solar works for your facility.
I work with Borrego Solar, a California-based company that provides commercial solar systems to California agricultural customers. I work with many food processors in the Valley, and I am typically seeing very good returns with systems generating roughly 5-year paybacks and greater than 20% IRRs.
For more than 30 years, Borrego Solar has been working to help customers go solar and we've built more than 55 MW to date. Some of our recent CA customers include:
- Madera Community Hospital - City of Ridgecrest - Padre Dam Municipal Water District - Helix Water District - Zone 7 Water District - Vista Irrigation District
If you or your facility have thought about solar, please do one of the following: - Send me a quick e mail. I will follow up with a call at your convenience; - Call me directly on my mobile at 415-378-5885; or, - Forward this to a colleague or staff member who has been thinking about this issue.
In five minutes, I can tell you more about our program and see if there might be an economic advantage to your going solar.
{!Contact.FirstName}, thanks for your time. Borrego Solar has been working with customers like you for more than 30 years, and I hope we'll have the opportunity to talk soon.
Best regards,
Steve Birndorf
Office: 510-496-8701 Mobile: 415-378-5885 Email: sbirndorf@borregosolar.com Web: http://www.borregosolar.com
